alert.note: Alert for Brazoria; Fort Bend; Galveston; Harris (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 18 at 5:35PM CDT until August 18 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN GALVESTON...EAST CENTRAL FORT BEND...NORTHERN BRAZORIA AND SOUTH CENTRAL HARRIS COUNTIES... At 535 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over northeastern Central Southwest, or over Astrodome Area, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Emergency management. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Pearland, eastern Missouri City, northern Friendswood, Stafford, South Houston, Bellaire, West University Place, northern Manvel, Hunters Creek Village, Bunker Hill Village, Piney Point Village, Midtown Houston, Downtown Houston, Greenway / Upper Kirby Area, Greater Heights, Fresno, South Belt / Ellington, Neartown / Montrose, Greater Eastwood and Greater Hobby Area. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
